mapper.select: SELECT p.image_url_fir AS imageUrlFir, p.product_name AS productName, oi.quantity AS quantity, oi.price * oi.quantity AS totalPrice, TO_CHAR(o.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDate FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON oi.product_code = p.product_code JOIN orders o ON oi.order_code = o.order_code WHERE o.user_code = #{userCode} ORDER BY orderDate DESC
